info.title: Crow's Eye Marketing Platform API
info.description: REST API for the Crow's Eye marketing automation platform

post.description:
Login endpoint that returns JWT token.

**Tier Required:** None (public endpoint)

get.description:
Get current user information.

**Tier Required:** Any authenticated user

post.description:
Logout endpoint (client-side token removal).

**Tier Required:** None

Upload media file (image, video, etc.).

**Tier Required:** Free+ (Spark tier and above)

Supports common media formats:
- Images: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP
- Videos: MP4, MOV, AVI

get.description:
List user's media files.

**Tier Required:** Free+ (Spark tier and above)

Get media file information by ID.

**Tier Required:** Free+ (Spark tier and above)

delete.description:
Delete media file by ID.

**Tier Required:** Free+ (Spark tier and above)

post.description:
Create a smart gallery using AI-powered media selection.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

The AI will analyze your media library and select the best items
based on your prompt. For example:
- "Best 5 photos for a winter campaign"
- "Show me photos with people for social media"
- "Find bread and bakery images for our website"

get.description:
List user's galleries.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

Get gallery by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

delete.description:
Delete gallery by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

put.description:
Update gallery by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

post.description:
Create formatted story from media.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

Automatically formats your media for Instagram/Facebook stories with:
- Optimal aspect ratio (9:16)
- Text overlays
- Style templates
- Transition effects

get.description:
List user's stories.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

Get story by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

delete.description:
Delete story by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

get.description:
List available story templates.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ (Creator tier and above)

schema.title: Response List Story Templates Stories Templates  Get

post.description:
Create 30-second highlight reel from media.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

AI-powered video editing creates engaging highlight reels with:
- Automatic scene detection and best moment selection
- Music synchronization and beat matching
- Professional transitions and effects
- Brand color integration
- Text overlays and captions

get.description:
List user's highlight reels.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

Get highlight reel by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

delete.description:
Delete highlight reel by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

get.description:
List available highlight reel styles.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

schema.title: Response List Highlight Styles Highlights Styles  Get

get.description:
Get processing status of highlight reel.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

post.description:
Import custom audio file with natural language editing capabilities.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

Supports audio formats:
- MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, OGG
- Automatic format conversion
- Volume normalization
- Audio enhancement

get.description:
Get audio file information by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

delete.description:
Delete audio file by ID.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

get.description:
List user's audio files.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

post.description:
Edit audio with natural language commands.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

Supported operations:
- Trim: "Cut from 0:30 to 1:45"
- Volume: "Increase volume by 20%"
- Fade: "Add fade in for 3 seconds"
- Normalize: "Normalize audio levels"
- Effects: "Add reverb", "Remove background noise"

get.description:
List available audio effects.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

schema.title: Response List Audio Effects Audio Effects  Get

get.description:
Analyze audio file properties and characteristics.

**Tier Required:** Creator+ ($9/month and above)

Get performance analytics for user's content.

**Tier Required:** Pro+ ($19/month and above)

Provides comprehensive analytics including:
- Engagement rates and trends
- Top performing content
- Platform-specific metrics
- Growth tracking
- Audience insights

post.description:
Export analytics data in CSV, JSON, or Excel format.

**Tier Required:** Pro+ ($19/month and above)

Export comprehensive analytics data for external analysis:
- Custom date ranges
- Platform filtering
- Multiple export formats
- Bulk data export

get.description:
Get AI-powered insights and recommendations.

**Tier Required:** Pro+ ($19/month and above)

Get competitor analysis and benchmarking.

**Tier Required:** Pro+ ($19/month and above)

Get executive summary report.

**Tier Required:** Pro+ ($19/month and above)

List all accounts in the organization.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

Provides comprehensive account management for Enterprise customers:
- View all team member accounts
- Filter by status and subscription tier
- Monitor usage and activity
- Manage permissions and access

post.description:
Create a new team member account.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

get.description:
Get detailed account information.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

put.description:
Update account information and permissions.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

delete.description:
Delete/deactivate an account.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

get.description:
Get organization-wide usage summary.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

Get detailed billing and usage information.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

post.description:
Reset password for a team member account.

**Tier Required:** Enterprise only

get.description: Root endpoint.
Health check endpoint.
